metafield.value:
• 1% for the Planet® donation
  • Donation goes to the environmental organisation Healthy Seas®
  • Healthy Seas® removes ghost fishing nets from our oceans. The same fishing nets used to create part of the ECONYL® yarn.
  • Sustainable - regenerative product

Premium Italian fabric made with the regenerative ECONYL® yarn.
ECONYL® utilizes reclaimed fishing nets and other waste in the production process turning these materials into new premium-grade regenerative nylon fabric.

• 78% ECONYL® regenerated Nylon
  • 22% Elastane

• Shape retention
  • Excellent coverage (absolutely non see-through)
  • UPF 50+ UV protection factor
  • Sun tan creams & oils resistant
  • Ultra chlorine resistant
  • Soft and smooth
  • Made in Italy
